main event: A star-like object was observed at Shiroi Air Base, Japan for a duration of two hours on November 7, 1957.
interesting points: The object was described as having a steady motion,The witness did not hear any sound from the object,Several possibilities were suggested for the object's nature including a balloon or an aircraft, It was reported that multiple observers saw the object, The sighting was part of the Project Blue Book documentation.
witness description: Various personnel at the Shiroi Air Base, including civilian guards.
